ch.cern.dod.ui.controller

Class TopBarController

  • java.lang.Object

        • org.zkoss.zul.impl.XulElement

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.zkoss.zk.ui.Component, org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.AfterCompose, org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.BeforeCompose, org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.Scope, org.zkoss.zk.ui.sys.ComponentCtrl

    public class TopBarController
extends org.zkoss.zul.Div
implements org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.BeforeCompose, org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.AfterCompose
    Controller for top bar's actions. It obtains some of the attributes that are used in the top bar, and it renders the announcement banner when needed.
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
